p.dialogue: The valley looks more interesting in the rain... don't you think?
The rain doesn't stop me from getting a job done! Although soggy wood isn't a joy to work with.
Greetings. Stay inside if you want to keep warm.
When it rains I have a good excuse to work on my gadgets all day. It must be kind of boring for you, though.
If you're lucky, you might see a frog in this weather.
A warm rain is a pleasant way to get clean.
Most people stay indoors on days like this... It's not good for business.
My garden is happy today. ...and our water bill will be lower this month.
Hmmph. This is not good weather for sports. Oh well, I can always lift weights inside.
It's awful cold, isn't it? What a rotten day.
When I woke up I heard dripping from somewhere... I think the roof might be leaking. In the old days, George would've scampered right up and fixed it... *sigh*
Hi there, @. Taking a break? I hope the river doesn't overflow...
Today would be a good day to explore the mines... Who knows, you might find some rare ores.
The raindrops are really loud on the metal roof of our trailer. ...It's soothing, though.
Howdy, kid. Stayin' dry?
It never rains in Calico Desert... That's where my friend Sandy lives. I wish I could've visited her today.
I spent all morning doing my hair... now the rain could mess it up. *sigh* ... Life is hard sometimes.
Did you wipe your boots off before coming in? Sorry... I just cleaned the floor. But you're always welcome in here! Heh.
Rain muffles sound, so I can play my guitar louder without my Mom getting mad. Hehe.
Maybe I should cook something new and exciting today. Something spicy.
Hmm... this weather makes me thirsty.
Hi @. You look like you're soaked...you poor thing!
Sometimes when I lay in bed I can hear a distant foghorn cut through the rain. But when I look out the window I see only a curtain of gray.
There's nothing like a glass of dry red wine on a day like this, huh? I love my job. Hehehe.
Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us dwarves live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Stormy days are the only time I can commune with certain elementals. I don't expect you to understand.
Hi @! Er... Read anything interesting in the library lately? Heh. Well, um... I'll see you around then?
I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here? I kind of miss the rain, actually...
Ah, the sewers are flowing quickly today. It'll get nice and humid in here... Just how I like it.
The valley is peaceful when it rains. To me... nature is someone I know, with different moods.
